sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: This is Euronews Now. I'm Helena Humphrey. Here are your top stories.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: President Zelenskyy expresses disappointment that UN nuclear inspectors have not yet called for the demilitarization of the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Argentina's vice president narrowly avoids assassination. A man aims a gun at Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner at close range, but the weapon fails to fire. And in sport, football's transfer window closes with a new spending record in the Premier League of over 2 billion euros. The Ukrainian president has criticized the result of the first day of the International

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Atomic Energy Agency's mission to the Zaporizhia nuclear power plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Volodymyr Zelensky says the visit failed to take any media to the plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: However, the director general of the IAEA says there's a lot to do.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: We are finishing our long awaited visit to the Zaporizhzhia Nuclear Power Plant.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: I have just completed a first tour of the key areas that we wanted to see in this first approach to the whole facility.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Of course there is a lot more to do.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: My team is staying on and more importantly and most importantly we are establishing a continued presence from the IAEA here. И самое главное, мы обеспечиваем продолжительность присутствия ИАЭА здесь.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Президент Зеленский надеялся, что интернациональная пресса будет вступить в 14-мембранную делегацию, чтобы они могли показать, что происходит на плантации.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Демилитаризация территории станции — это цель украинских и интернациональных действий. Demilitarization of the territory of the station is the goal of Ukrainian and international efforts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: And it is bad that we have not yet heard the appropriate messages from the IAEA, despite the fact that we talked about it with Mr. Grusy during our meeting in Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It was the key, the key security point of our agreements.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: It was outlined clearly.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: Demilitarization and full control by our nuclear workers.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, Russian President Vladimir Putin visited pupils in Russia's enclave of Kaliningrad to mark the beginning of the school year.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: He explained to them that Russian troops were defending their country and its people.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A 35-year-old man's been arrested after pointing a handgun at point-blank range at the head of Argentina's Vice President Cristina Kirchner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: It happened as she arrived at her home in Buenos Aires, where hundreds of her supporters had gathered.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Fortunately, the gun didn't go off and she was unharmed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The president calls the dramatic incident the most serious since the country regained democracy and has made Friday a national holiday for people to express themselves in defense of life.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Here's the moment again in slow motion.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The man was immediately detained and officials have characterized it as an assassination attempt.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Amid a massive presence of people in front of the vice president's residence, a man pointed a firearm at her head and pulled the trigger.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: Cristina is alive because, for a reason not technically confirmed, the gun, which contained five bullets, did not fire, despite the trigger having been pulled.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Such a reality moves all Argentinians, and in particular those who are their loved ones, and we embrace her in solidarity with all our affection.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The solidarity rallies at her home began last week over corruption charges against the 69-year-old.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: The long-running accusations are that she championed a construction company for road contracts during her two terms as president, which belonged to a close ally.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Her supporters have also gathered outside the Senate.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: But clashes have followed and the government has been accused of repressing demonstrations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Just last week, a judge called for a 12-year sentence if she were to be convicted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_08
sentences.sentence: This comment has sparked widespread demonstrations across the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: She says the charges are politically motivated.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: At a primetime address in Philadelphia, the city where American democracy was born,

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: U.S. President Joe Biden says the supporters of his predecessor's agenda are threatening it.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The speech just two months before midterm elections.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: As I stand here tonight, equality and democracy are under assault.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We do ourselves no favor to pretend otherwise. So tonight, I've come to this place where it all began, to speak as plainly as I can to the nation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Too much of what's happening in our country today is not normal.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: Donald Trump and the MAGA Republicans represent an extremism that threatens the very foundations of our republic.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: We here, you've heard it, more and more talk about violence as an acceptable political tool in this country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: It's not. It can never be an acceptable tool.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07
sentences.sentence: So I want to say this plain and simple. There is no place for political violence in America, period. None ever.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Top Republican Kevin McCarthy has hit back at the speech, saying Biden severely wounded America's soul. The president who came into office pledging to unite the country has recently sharpened his rhetoric. A retired NYPD officer has been sentenced to 10

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: years in prison after attacking police officers with a metal flagpole at the Capitol Hill riots in 2021. Thomas Webster's sentence is the longest so far among roughly 250 people who've been punished for their conduct that day.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Mr. Webster was held accountable for his actions at the Capitol on January 6th.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: I hope after today as Americans we can come together and start talking about things like forgiveness and kindness and peace. Thank you.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: This is the moment police body cam images show the violent confrontation between the NYPD veteran and the officers guarding Capitol Hill. Prosecutors say Webster led the charge against the police barricades at the Lower West Plaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The judge has allowed him to report to prison at a date not yet determined, instead of immediately ordering him into custody.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Scooter drivers and motorbikes will now have to pay to park in the streets of Paris.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The French capital says the change is necessary to respond to climate and public health issues.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Motorcycles will be charged three euros in the centre and two in the outer districts.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: However, electric motorbikes and electric scooters are exempt from paying. An earthquake on Thursday in Lichtenstein briefly disrupted Parliament.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The 3.9 magnitude quake happened just as lawmakers were debating whether the nation needed an earthquake insurance.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A smaller tremor measuring 2.1 was felt a few seconds before the more powerful one.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: There were no reported injuries or damage to property.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The lead singer of Canadian indie rock band Arcade Fire has been accused of sexual misconduct.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Four people allege Wynne Butler behaved inappropriately, accusing him of forceful touching and unwanted sexual text messages.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Butler denies the claims, which come just before the first date of the band's world tour. Singer-songwriter Feist has pulled out from her support slot.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Premier League clubs have spent a record-breaking total of more than 2 billion euros in a thrilling summer transfer window.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sealing the deal, the most expensive deadline day signing ever, Manchester United's 94 million euro purchase of Brazilian footballer Antony.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: It's my dream come true.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: I'm really grateful for the support and faith shown in me by everyone here. Estou muito grato pelo apoio e a fé que me dão por aqui.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Quero fazer história aqui.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Nove dos 20 clubes de top flight passaram em excesso de 115 milhões de euros depois de duas séries de declínio de impacto da Covid.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Outros recordes incluem Chelsea, que paga mais em um window do que qualquer outro clube na história da Premier League. of COVID-impacted decline. Other records include Chelsea spending more in one window than any other club in Premier League history. Manchester United smashing their own summer spending record.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Nottingham Forest signing more players in one summer than any other British club in history.
